statements: SELECT * FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT timestamp, location_name FROM location_data WHERE longitude < -100 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT location_id, longitude FROM location_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT location_name, timestamp FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -100.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM location_data GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE location_name LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArvrLocationData;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM ArvrLocationData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, online_status FROM ArvrUser WHERE location_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM ArvrUser WHERE online_status = true;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM ArvrLocationData WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ArvrLocationData WHERE latitude > 0.0 AND longitude < 0.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM ArvrLocationData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND (latitude <= 10.0 OR longitude >= -10.0)
SELECT user_id, username, online_status FROM ArvrUser WHERE online_status = TRUE ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, username, latitude, longitude FROM ArvrUser JOIN ArvrLocationData ON ArvrUser.location_id = ArvrLocationData.id WHERE latitude > 5.0
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude, AVG(longitude) AS avg_longitude FROM ArvrLocationData
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT ul.user_id, u.username, l.location_name, ul.visit_date FROM users u JOIN user_locations ul ON u.user_id = ul.user_id JOIN locations l ON ul.location_id = l.location_id ORDER BY ul.visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT user_id, visit_date FROM user_locations WHERE location_id = 5
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2020-01-01'

SELECT users.username, locations.location_name, user_locations.visit_date FROM users JOIN user_locations ON users.user_id = user_locations.user_id JOIN locations ON user_locations.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY user_locations.visit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Locations
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations
SELECT user_name, role FROM Users
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM Devices
SELECT log_id, action_time FROM Logs
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, user_name FROM Devices JOIN Users ON Devices.user_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT log_id, user_name, device_name, action_time FROM Logs JOIN Users ON Logs.user_id = Users.user_id JOIN Devices ON Logs.device_id = Devices.device_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT device_id, device_name, platform FROM devices ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT device_name, platform FROM devices WHERE platform IS NOT NULL ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE end_time IS NULL AND start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 0 OR longitude > 0 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
